alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:50PM EDT until June 09 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WALTON AND NORTHWESTERN HOLMES COUNTIES... At 1249 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Geneva to 12 miles southeast of Laurel Hill, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Darlington, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Hickory Hill, Izagora, New Harmony, Piney Grove, Mossy Head and Caney Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
